questions.question: Match the following drugs with the conditions they are used to treat: Conditions Drugs 1. Delirium Tremens a. Naloxone 2. Acute Alcoholism b. Oxazepam 3. Smoking Cessation c. Acamprosate 4. Opioid Poisoning d. Varenicline
questions.explanation: Correct Answer: D) 1-b, 2-c, 3-d, 4-a Explanation: Conditions Drugs Delirium Tremens Oxazepam Acute Alcoholism Acamprosate Smoking Cessation Varenicline Opioid Poisoning Naloxone Reference: KD Tripathi Essentials of Medical Pharmacology, 8th Edition, Pages 421, 501 Goodman and Gilman's Pharmacological Basis of Therapeutics, 14th Edition, Page 246
